name: LA KIPANA
description:
Small Platform Adventure game made in unity

Features: platforming, combat, frustration, Voice Acting, Original Music

Adventure through the jungle of Yggbrazil with Lauriel Kipana and find the secrets it holds

Thank you, Kipão, for letting me use your original character in this game.

Any feedback is appreciated!

WASD to move, space to jump, J to attack!! R to reset the level.
